subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jason Smith, Ales Hemsky and Jarret Stoll each scored in the third period for the Edmonton Oilers, who overcame a two-goal deficit to capture a victory over the San Jose Sharks. The Western Conference semifinal series is now tied at 2-2.
snippet: Jason Smith, Ales Hemsky and Jarret Stoll each scored in the third period for the Edmonton Oilers, who overcame a two-goal deficit to capture a victory over the San Jose Sharks. The Western Conference semifinal series is now tied at 2-2.
